H0.text: In 1610, who became the first person to observe Saturn’s rings through a telescope. Christoph Clavius

H1.text: In 1610, who became the first person to observe Saturn’s rings through a telescope. Simon Marius

H2.text: In 1610, who became the first person to observe Saturn’s rings through a telescope. Johannes Kepler

H3.text: In 1610, who became the first person to observe Saturn’s rings through a telescope. Galaleo

A4.text: Galileo observed Saturn’s rings through a telescope in 1610.
